Jargon Term: You improved with these interventions, and by discharge, you were back on 3 L NC as you are normally at home.
Please take all your medications as prescribed.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Please keep all your medical appointments.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - Specialist appointment

Jargon Term: Please return to the ED or call your PCP if you have worsening shortness of breath, chest pain, fever >101.4 F, or any other symptoms which are concerning to you.
